name: LEGENDS of EPICA
description:
LEGENDS of EPICA is a fantasy role-playing game, set in a open world rattled by climate change. Journey, explore, and fight. Embark on a journey which will take you to unique regions, each with new quests, puzzles, and space to explore. Compete with other players for rank one on the ladder. LEGENDS of EPICA development begun in late 2015, and is created with Unreal Engine, by a single developer.

Game Features

  • Hardcore mode, no respawns, or very few extra lifes
  • Open world
  • Three character classes, the warrior, the ranger, and the wizard
  • Dynamic combat
  • Procedural generated dungeons
  • Day and night cycle
  • Underwater world
  • Differently designed regions
  • Fast travel by mount, ship, or teleportation scroll
  • Player professions such as mining or herbalism
  • Leaderboard
  • Character creation system

State of Content Overview

Main locations include

  • Artol
  • Greenhills
  • Naerocks
  • Triquidor
  • Swamps (not yet fully integrated)
  • Mountains (not yet integrated)

Current content

  • Small dungeons = 4
  • Big dungeons = 0
  • Procedural generated dungeon = 1
  • Quests = +30
  • Villages = 3
  • Harbors = 3
  • Unique locations = ~20
  • Unique NPC’s = 150+
